mapper.insert: INSERT INTO V3_Board_IMG(no, filename, filedata, board_no, date1) VALUES(SEQ_V3_BOARD_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{filename}, #{filedata, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{board_no}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO "V3_BOARD"(NO, title, content, writer, date1) VALUES(#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT no, title, content, writer, hit, date1, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY no DESC) rown FROM V3_BOARD ) WHERE rown BETWEEN #{page} and #{page}+9
